description:
From big walls to gear-heavy days, the Syncro harness has the gear capacity for just about anything. The beefy waistbelt and leg loops support you in hanging belays and distribute the weight of your gear evenly throughout the harness. 6 gear loops and 2 ice clipper slots provide plenty of gear organization without bunching everything together.

  • Wide padded waistbelt distributes load over a large surface area
  • Ventilated mesh in the lumbar area keeps things airy
  • Two waistbelt buckles keep the tie-in point centred
  • Adjustable buckles on the leg loops accommodate layers
  • 6 gear loops: two rigid front loops and four flexible rear loops for organized racking
  • Two ice clipper slots and a rear haul loop
name: Wild Country Syncro Harness - Unisex
